<p><b>Section 8 - Other Events</p>
<p>Item 8.01. 	Other Events.</b></p>

<p>This current report on Form 8-K relates to the monthly distribution reported to the holders of Bear Stearns Asset Backed Securities Trust 2004-HE3, Asset-Backed Certificates, Series 2004-HE3, which was made on December 27, 2004.</p>

<p><b>Section 9 - Financial Statements and Exhibits</p>
<p>Item 9.01	Financial Statements and Exhibits.</b></p>
<P>(c) Exhibits</P>
<p align="left">
99.1 Monthly distribution report pursuant to section 5.05 of the Pooling and Servicing Agreement for the distribution on December 27, 2004.</p>

<p>(Exhibit No. Description) </p>
